27.text:
On July 28, 2020, T-Mobile US, Inc. issued a press release announcing the preliminary results of its previously announced rights offering,
      which expired in accordance with its terms at 5:00 p.m., Eastern Time, on July 27, 2020. A copy of this press release is filed as Exhibit 99.1 to this Form 8-K and is incorporated by reference herein.
